body_html: Those lines don't both get executed. Only one of them does. It depends on you enable using peepholes or not. Finally, this forget_bias is added via broadcasting (so it's ok for it to be a scalar). The "true" bias is added at line 504, via tf.bias_add.
body_text: Those lines don't both get executed.  Only one of them does.  It depends on you enable using peepholes or not.  Finally, this forget_bias is added via broadcasting (so it's ok for it to be a scalar).  The "true" bias is added at line 504, via tf.bias_add.
body: Those lines don't both get executed.  Only one of them does.  It depends on you enable using peepholes or not.  Finally, this forget_bias is added via broadcasting (so it's ok for it to be a scalar).  The "true" bias is added at line 504, via tf.bias_add.
